Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Small rounded-based goblet with a restricted mouth and a simple rim. The interior surface is grey and has been polished, whereas the outside surface bears a red slip and highly visible traces of a heavy burnish, the gloss of which is only partly preserved. Both surfaces show numerous traces of an organic temper.
